FileFormat.FormatDescription: Alias is a Computer Aided Design software family owned by Autodesk. The Scene Description Language file defines a 3D scene, including its models, shaders, lights, and animation. Files of this type may lack a file extension.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Canadian Centre for Architecture / The Canadian Centre for Architecture

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: DEFINITION{1-512}version*MODEL - This signature assumes the version is defined as a minimum but this assumption may need to be revised as further format examples are encountered. It may be desirable to distinguish between different versions. https://www.autodesk.com/techpubs/studiotools/13/PDFs/SDL
